application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1-Hornbeam(Carpinus) FRONT -reduce crown by 30%(2m) to -lift crown by 0.5m removing lowest branches to main trunk collar to ensure good separation from covered area roofT2-FRONT Sorbus-tree causing root leverage to tarmac close to trunk base; recommend excavating tarmac around tree to allow space for wooden seat acting as shallow raised bed -light reduction by 25% to suitable growth pointsT3-T4- FRONT Indian Bean Tree(Catalpa bignoniodes) -light 25%  reduction to suitable growth points -reduce lateral branch length to maych, shape, balance and tidyT5- FRONT Mountain Ash(Sorbus acuparia) -light reduction by 25% to shape balance and tidy In Infant Play areaT6-Cherry(Prunus) REAR -reduce crown by 25%(1.3m) to suitable growth points -reduce lateral branch length to match, shape, balance and tidyT7-Holly(Ilex aquifolia) REAR -reduce crown by 25% all around -lift by 0.5m to clear lean-to perspex roof All works are for routine maintanence
site_name: Wendell Park Primary School Stronsa RoadLondonW12 9LB
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
